comment.author: 61804295@N00
comment._content: Is this to do with "Sung by Sabu with the Bob Dyer 2UW radio show" --Cover. library.sl.nsw.gov.au/search~S2/dPopular+music+--+Austral... see library.sl.nsw.gov.au

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Hi spelio, This is the same person. Sabu was an Indian film actor probably best known for his roles as Mowgli in Jungle Book and Abu in the Thief of Baghdad. He became an American citizen in the 1940s and joined the American Air Force towards the end of WWII. Sabu did sing in at least one film - 'I want to be a sailor' in Thief of Baghdad. He died in 1963. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sabu_Dastagir
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
